output.sentences: The first half was market by some really big plays, such as the Charger's right end catching the ball on their 22 yd line.
The half-time was entertaining as usual with the cheerleaders  :)
In the second half the roles were reversed and the other team made a comeback.
And the fans had a really good time.
The home team had won the day.
